Package socialmagnet.controller

Class MemberController

java.lang.Object
socialmagnet.controller.MemberController
public class MemberController
extends java.lang.Object
This Class represents the MemberController that contains methods related to the Member class such as registering, login, showing a member's list of friends and friend requests, and creating a friend request.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    MemberController()
    Create a MemberController with a new instance of a MemberDAO and FarmerDAO objects

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void createFriendRequest​(java.lang.String sender)
    Creates a new friend request
    boolean login​(Session session)
    Displays the login interface and if the inputted credentials are correct, the user is logged in
    void register()
    Displays the interface when registering a user and registers the user based on the entered details if the inputs are valid
    void registerMemberFactory​(java.lang.String fullname, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
    Registers a member based on their inputted full name, username and password and adds them to the database
    Member retrieveMemberFactory​(java.lang.String username)
    Retrieves and returns a Member object identified by its username
    void showFriends​(java.lang.String username)
    Displays the list of friends the specified user has
    void showRequests​(java.lang.String username)
    Displays the list of friend requests the specified user has

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • registerMemberFactory

      public void registerMemberFactory​(java.lang.String fullname, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Registers a member based on their inputted full name, username and password and adds them to the database
      Parameters:
      fullname - A String representing the user's full name
      username - A String representing the user's username
      password - A String representing the user's password

    • retrieveMemberFactory

      public Member retrieveMemberFactory​(java.lang.String username)
      Retrieves and returns a Member object identified by its username
      Parameters:
      username - A String representing the user's username
      Returns:
      A Member object representing the member retrieved

    • register

      public void register()
      Displays the interface when registering a user and registers the user based on the entered details if the inputs are valid

    • login

      public boolean login​(Session session)
      Displays the login interface and if the inputted credentials are correct, the user is logged in
      Parameters:
      session - The session object
      Returns:
      true is login is successful, else return false

    • showFriends

      public void showFriends​(java.lang.String username)

      Parameters:
      username - A String representing the user's username
